description: Tools for monitoring overall system health and performance

tools.name: get_system_health_status
tools.description: Retrieves current health status and metrics for production systems including CPU, memory, disk usage, and service availability

system_filter.description: Optional filter to check specific systems or services

include_metrics.description: Whether to include detailed performance metrics

tools.name: check_service_availability
tools.description: Tests connectivity and response times for critical services and endpoints

services.description: List of service names to check, or empty array for all services

timeout_seconds.description: Timeout for each service check in seconds

include_dependencies.description: Whether to check dependent services as well

tools.name: send_alert_notification
tools.description: Sends alert notifications to configured channels when system issues are detected

tools.name: get_infrastructure_logs
tools.description: Retrieves and filters system logs for error analysis and troubleshooting

system_name.description: Name of the system to get logs from

time_range_minutes.description: Number of minutes back to retrieve logs

search_pattern.description: Optional regex pattern to filter log entries
